item.description:
Come join us for brunch in South Boston.

Amrheins has been a Boston tradition since 1890. For over a century diners throughout the city of Boston have been welcomed into Amrheins to enjoy quality meals amongst friends and neighbors. Today that tradition continues in our updated facility. Despite the renovations in 2005, Amrheins is still full of history. Amrheins is the proud home of the oldest hand carved bar in America and still has the first Draft Beer pump in Boston on display.

The brunch buffet offers a carving station, omelet station, traditional breakfast items, dessert table and coffee/tea. It is one price at $15.95.

It is located at Broadway and A Street in South Boston, steps from the Broadway stop on the Red Line or there is ample parking. Directions can be found here: http://www.amrheinsbo...

Please join us!

Rules for Engagement:

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

All RSVP's are on a first come, first served basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment requesting to be placed on wait list.

If this event is full and you wish to attend, please RSVP NO with a comment to be wait listed. If there is an overwhelming response, the reservation may be increased or another seating arranged.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended the event, it will count as if you NO-SHOWED for three events.

If I change you're RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update event confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the event, it will count as if you NO-SHOWED for three events.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

If it is less than twenty-fours from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you must call or text me at 781-801-3157.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

Your feedback is appreciated so, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterwards.
